events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle at an intersection, requesting immediate assistance.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report mentioning damage to the car and collision specifics.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned promptly to ensure customer concerns are addressed efficiently.
The customer received official acknowledgement of their claim submission and was informed about next steps.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police report to proceed with the investigation.
The customer uploaded all requested documents including images of the accident damage and the official police report.
The claims investigation team initiated a detailed review of the vehicle damage and circumstances surrounding the collision.
Investigation concluded confirming coverage and fault details; the damages correspond to the customer's accident report.
A full settlement proposal was sent to the customer outlining reimbursement amounts for vehicle repairs.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the settlement offer and quick processing.
The claim was officially approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms and review outcomes.
Reimbursement payment was processed and transferred to the customer's bank account for the vehicle repair costs.
The claim file was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and confirmation of repair completion.
